intro: Pleurospermum yunnanense, commonly known as Yunnan pleurospermum, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its hairy stems and basal leaves. The plant produces small, yellow flowers arranged in a composite head, typical of the daisy family. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
